title: 3BR near WSU and CCS-5538 101-Cass Ave
posting_body: Large 2  bedroom 2 bath + bonus room apartment featuring hardwood floors, interior brick work, great view of midtown, and an awesome community!
Live in the heart of Midtown!
Cass and Ferry Apartments is the perfect location in Midtown Detroit located on the campus of Wayne State University.
Location is everything in selecting a new apartment and you are within walking distance of schools, shopping, entertainment, clubs, museums and hospitals.

These historic buildings offer a variety of floor plans with many unique features including hardwood floors, French doors, bay windows, 9' ceilings, wood molding, tile floors, and many more.*Pictures may be of model unit and not actual unit*
GET YOUR ROOMMATES TOGETHER AND CALL TODAY!
